Articles.Content:
Hello there, my name is Typhor and I've decided to stop lurking around the forums and contribute for a change.

I actually had an account before this, but it got destroyed in the forum crash, so naturally I was discouraged for a while. Seeing two hundred posts, even if small to other people's loss, go down the drain isn't appreciated. I decided to start a new profile, new slate, and build a new name. I hope to lend my expertise in this wonderful game to less experienced players, and veterans alike.

A little about myself, which no doubt you'll be enthralled with. I'm sixteen years old, and am currently residing in the wonderful capital of Canada. In addition to an obvious obsession with spacecraft, astronomy, and orbital physics, I'm in love with music. I love listening to a mixture of electro, Bach fugues, and modern orchestral music. I also play in the Ottawa Youth Orchestra, even though I'm a year behind all the other horns there. Even though I'm probably the best horn of my age in Ottawa, that doesn't really mean much because there isn't a lot of us out there. In addition I enjoy reading; Mercedes Lackey. Orson Scott Card, and Kim Stanley Robinson are all fair game.

Thank you for your attention, and I hope to contribute my intelligence and wit to this magnificent community.

-Typhor
